definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several

sentences.english: In those days we did not need spies to watch the enemy's movement .
sentences.chinese: 在那些日子裏，我們不需要情報員注意敵人動向。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允許酷刑的人卻不會受到任何處罰。

sentences.english: Beauty fit to ornament those ancient manors.
sentences.chinese: 適於裝飾那些古老的莊園的美人。

sentences.english: There is no man but feels (ie no man who does not feel) pity for starving children.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人不同情那些嗷嗷待哺的孩子。

sentences.english: The books and journal were informative.
sentences.chinese: 那些書和日記信息量很足。

sentences.english: Later, those boats were heavily outrun by modern ships.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，那些船很重地根據現代船跑得更快。

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 當然我們並不認同那些片面誇大反向收購作用的作法。

sentences.english: Don't take it to heart. They are just babes and sucklings.
sentences.chinese: 不要放在心上，那些只是些乳臭未乾的小子。

sentences.english: What advice do you have for anyone looking to start a collection of single malts ?
sentences.chinese: 你對那些想開始收藏單麥芽威士忌的人有何建議？

sentences.english: Why on earth have Man Booker's publicists chosen the Groucho?
sentences.chinese: 布克獎的那些公關爲什麼會選擇格勞喬這個鬼地方？

sentences.english: Florals are for middle-aged women with weight problems.
sentences.chinese: 大花圖案都是爲那些有體重問題的中年婦女所準備的。

sentences.english: You can tell the very rich by their evening dress.
sentences.chinese: 你可從夜禮服認出那些極有錢的富人。

sentences.english: For him to take that opportunity - he deserves a lot of respect for that.
sentences.chinese: 他則把握了那些機會，他配得上這些尊重。

sentences.english: He slowly climbed over the fallen rocks.
sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地爬過那些落下來的岩石。

sentences.english: Those metal utensils are jingling as the car bumps along.
sentences.chinese: 顛簸，那些金屬器皿在玎璫作響。

sentences.english: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. ---E. Roosevelt.
sentences.chinese: 未來屬於那些堅信他們夢中之美的人們。

definition: some/a few/a little/(following an adjective) slightly ...er
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
